img_text: I'm here IT'S ME, REN KOUHA. WHAT DID YOU SAY? ARE YOU TRYING TO PICK A FIGHT WITH ME? EH!? WEREN' You A Lo SHORTER!!? ITS TODAY'S WHAT THE HELL'S WITH ALL THAT FISH... HEY BROTHER MEAL FOR MEL, SAY EVERYONE ON THE SOME THING TO THIS RUDE AND HARD-TO- KILL GU ISLAND, Rên Kouha Former Third Princ of the Kou Empire
